lead_paragraph: Rocky Stonebridge and Oliver "Puddin' Head" Johnson find themselves stranded on pirate-infested Tortuga Island, serving as waiters at an inn where they are given a love letter to deliver. They accidentally switch the letter for Captain Kidd's treasure map and are abducted by Captain Kid and and taken to Skull Island.
